thread.title: Simon Cowell, Ant and Dec rush to help stricken contestant after stage collapse during BGT auditions
thread.title_full: Simon Cowell, Ant and Dec rush to help stricken contestant after stage collapse during BGT auditions

author: dcoombs
title: Simon Cowell, Ant and Dec rush to help stricken contestant after stage collapse during BGT auditions
text:
COWELL'S STAGE DASH Simon Cowell, Ant and Dec rush to help stricken contestant after stage collapse during BGT auditions 
Young singer was performing a Frank Sinatra classic along with his mum at the Birmingham auditions when he collapsed Exclusive BRITAIN’S Got Talent was plunged into chaos when a contestant collapsed on stage. 
Panicking judge Simon Cowell rushed to help the wannabe singer named only as Luke. Rex Features 3 Rushed to help… Simon Cowell at the Birmingham auditions 
He was followed by hosts Ant and Dec and the ITV show’s team of paramedics at the Birmingham auditions. 
Luke, in his 20s, was singing Frank Sinatra’s My Way with his mum Mary, 52. PA:Press Association 3 The award-winning hosts opted for similar ensembles 
An audience member said: “His grandad died that day and combined with the stress of auditions, it really got to him. 
“It was incredibly scary. Luke was singing with his mum and suddenly he just fell. Related Stories 'I want to look as good as Alesha' Amanda Holden reveals fellow BGT judge Alesha Dixon is her gym inspiration BRITAIN'S BOT TALENT Amanda Holden enjoys the craic with cheeky peek back at worker's wardrobe malfunction GET READY, JEZZA Honey G BLOCKS DJ Talent on Twitter - as he calls for Jeremy Kyle to make her take lie detector test 'I'm the world's biggest flirt' Amanda Holden reveals all about Simon Cowell, topless pics and growing old gracefully Birthday bears Simon Cowell hires bizarre BGT bear act for his son's birthday party ...whilst unimpressed Alesha buzzes them 
”All of the judges jumped to their feet, and Simon rushed on stage. Luke’s mum was cradling him in her arms. 
“They were the last act of the night and Simon thanked the audience for being compassionate.” 
BGT said the lad had fainted but was given the all-clear and told to rest. INSTAGRAM/NOHOLDENBACK David Walliams, Simon Cowell, Amanda Holden, Alesha Dixon and Ant and Dec all flew to the Blackpool auditions on a jet courtesy of Simon A round-up of the best of Britain’s Got Talent from over the last 10 years
